PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-08252013-06-18NRCAN,  NEB,  ,  ,  , 
ActNational Energy Board Act
SubjectAdministrative Monetary Penalties Regulations (National Energy Board)
PrecisADMINISTRATIVE MONETARY PENALTIES REGULATIONS (NATIONAL ENERGY BOARD) in order to clearly describe what contraventions and non-compliances would be designated as violations that could be subject to an administrative monetary penalty; the method for calculating the amount payable as the penalty; and, the method of serving documents.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2013-0138 Publication Date: 2013-07-03
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Administrative Monetary Penalties Regulations (National Energy Board)
precis: ADMINISTRATIVE MONETARY PENALTIES REGULATIONS (NATIONAL ENERGY BOARD) in order to clearly describe what contraventions and non-compliances would be designated as violations that could be subject to an administrative monetary penalty; the method for calculating the amount payable as the penalty; and, the method of serving documents.
